name: Caesura
description:
On the day of a very important piano concert, you accidentally wake up later than intended and find yourself having only ten minutes to gather notes and compose a melody! However, a plethora of distractions is sure to set you off track if you accidentally get too close, making your task a little more difficult. Now is not the time to get scatterbrained!

Explore the level and its many areas to gather all the scattered notes and bring them back to the piano to compose your own melody! Avoid the distractions made evident by a red outline and unlock new rooms as notes are added to your melody.

Tried to speedrun? Tell us your best time!

--------------------------------------------------

Controls for Keyboard

A and D to move left and right
W or Space to jump (you can double jump from the start)
E to interact
W, S or Arrow Keys to move notes on the staff

Controls for Controller

Left Joystick to move
A to jump
X to interact
